comments.comment: Welcome to Apache MXNet (incubating)! We are on a mission to democratize AI, and we are glad that you are contributing to it by opening this issue. Please make sure to include all the relevant context, and one of the @apache/mxnet-committers will be here shortly. If you are interested in contributing to our project, let us know! Also, be sure to check out our guide on <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/community/contribute>contributing to MXNet</denchmark-link> and our <denchmark-link:https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MXNET/Developments>development guides wiki</denchmark-link> .
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/keithbriggs>@keithbriggs</denchmark-link> . Thanks for reporting this. Could you provide the link to the webpage that has the broken link?

In the issue title.
Another one: at <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.6/get_started/build_from_source>https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.6/get_started/build_from_source</denchmark-link> , it says "Starting with MXNet 1.7, MXNet recommends using the cmake cross platform build tool", but at <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.6/get_started/download>https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/versions/1.6/get_started/download</denchmark-link> , the latest release is 1.6.0. <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
________________________________ From: Sheng Zha <notifications@github.com> Sent: 10 September 2020 20:33 To: apache/incubator-mxnet <incubator-mxnet@noreply.github.com> Cc: Briggs,KM,Keith,TUD2 R <keith.briggs@bt.com>; Mention <mention@noreply.github.com> Subject: Re: [apache/incubator-mxnet] Installation missing at https://github.com/deepinsight/mxnet (#19114)
Hi @keithbriggs<https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fkeithbriggs&data=02%7C01%7Ckeith.briggs%40bt.com%7C97f9782d2b5d4c00203f08d855c0749c%7Ca7f356889c004d5eba4129f146377ab0%7C0%7C0%7C637353632365858397&sdata=7nhdaxWA90o48JECD4f%2BVq%2B1hmk1nm8h79WmP9sBx1o%3D&reserved=0>. Thanks for reporting this. Could you provide the link to the webpage that has the broken link?
— You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fapache%2Fincubator-mxnet%2Fissues%2F19114%23issuecomment-690669589&data=02%7C01%7Ckeith.briggs%40bt.com%7C97f9782d2b5d4c00203f08d855c0749c%7Ca7f356889c004d5eba4129f146377ab0%7C0%7C0%7C637353632365858397&sdata=hcG%2FMfG8FLmC80LqafB1pdf1kESjVfsWiaK8GuZPELc%3D&reserved=0>, or unsubscribe<https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fnotifications%2Funsubscribe-auth%2FABHIQEKJPBFNRLLXEZUUGDTSFESZXANCNFSM4RFWKP7A&data=02%7C01%7Ckeith.briggs%40bt.com%7C97f9782d2b5d4c00203f08d855c0749c%7Ca7f356889c004d5eba4129f146377ab0%7C0%7C0%7C637353632365868389&sdata=b3tG2rF82QA8vlvWnVCpdY1YTIVwHkalSQEHwfV%2F7yo%3D&reserved=0>.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/keithbriggs>@keithbriggs</denchmark-link> thanks. The one in the title is a fork of mxnet by deepinsight (so <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nttstar>@nttstar</denchmark-link> may be able to help you). The 1.7 website update is ongoing in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/19102>#19102</denchmark-link> and will be made available soon.

Ok, thanks. Very confusing, all these forks with similar names... <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
________________________________ From: Sheng Zha <notifications@github.com> Sent: 10 September 2020 20:42 To: apache/incubator-mxnet <incubator-mxnet@noreply.github.com> Cc: Briggs,KM,Keith,TUD2 R <keith.briggs@bt.com>; Mention <mention@noreply.github.com> Subject: Re: [apache/incubator-mxnet] Installation missing at https://github.com/deepinsight/mxnet (#19114)
@keithbriggs<https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fkeithbriggs&data=02%7C01%7Ckeith.briggs%40bt.com%7C077d67c3a8ff47562cb208d855c1a04a%7Ca7f356889c004d5eba4129f146377ab0%7C0%7C0%7C637353637387733614&sdata=htDftt8sbwEdDJLyoD0sUs2T7ZYGkpKx2tykbe6jvfE%3D&reserved=0> thanks. The one in the title is a fork of mxnet by deepinsight (so @nttstar<https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fnttstar&data=02%7C01%7Ckeith.briggs%40bt.com%7C077d67c3a8ff47562cb208d855c1a04a%7Ca7f356889c004d5eba4129f146377ab0%7C0%7C0%7C637353637387733614&sdata=UWm%2B0O%2FQ3vieb%2FMB%2B8ZkaiBx5CbwiejkxXBaLzWHufk%3D&reserved=0> may be able to help you). The 1.7 website update is ongoing in #19102<https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fapache%2Fincubator-mxnet%2Fpull%2F19102&data=02%7C01%7Ckeith.briggs%40bt.com%7C077d67c3a8ff47562cb208d855c1a04a%7Ca7f356889c004d5eba4129f146377ab0%7C0%7C0%7C637353637387743608&sdata=gJ9eH4tjVG1MMGopcVYnnb5bCP4b2r6MO9btbARke9w%3D&reserved=0> and will be made available soon.
